footer.description:
OB possessed legal licenses issued by the European’s Malta MGA and The Philippines’ PAGCOR.
We are a legalized company recognized globally and registered in the British Virgin Islands. Please make sure you are at least 18 years old before registering with us.

event_page.title: CHINESE NEW YEAR ANGPOW RAIN MINI GAMES T&C
event_page.description: All OB members are entitled to participate and play in this Mini Game. Promotion period starts from 15th Jan 2022 12:00:00 (GMT+8) until 30th Jan 2023 23:59:59 (GMT+8).
event_page.How_to_Claim__description: To redeem the mini game ticket, members are required to make a single minimum deposit of SGD 100 to get 1 ticket.
event_page.Rules__description1: 1. In order to claim these Mini Games tickets, the deposit amount must be a single minimum of SGD 100 or above. Members are allowed to obtain a maximum of five (5) Mini Game Tickets per day.
event_page.Rules__description2: 2. Once you have redeemed the Mini games tickets, you have to choose 1 out of 2 Penalty kicks shooting direction and claim the Cash Prizes. All prizes will be credited to the player's account automatically within 60 seconds.
event_page.Rules__description3:
3. You are require to meet x1 turnover before withdrawal can be made. (Total turnover 1 times of the bonus)
Example:
Mini Game Bonus: SGD 999
Required Bet Amount = SGD 999 x 1 = SGD 999
event_page.Rules__description4: 4. The Mini Game's ticket is only available from 19st Nov 2022 12:00:00 (GMT+8) until 18th Dec 2022 23:59:59 (GMT+8) and will expire on 19th Dec 2022 00:00:00 (GMT+8)
event_page.Rules__description5: 5. Members must use all tickets before the expiration date
event_page.Rules__description6: 6. This promotion cannot be used in conjunction with other OB promotions.
event_page.Rules__description7: 7. OB reserves the right to modify, cancel, suspend or terminate the promotion and/or change the terms of the said promotion at any time without prior notice.
event_page.Rules__description8: 8. Participating members must accept and comply with all the terms mentioned above as well as all relevant rules and regulations stated on the OB website.
event_page.Term_Conditions__item__content3: During FIFA WORLD CUP period , bet on any sports and esport match . Enjoy the special rewards !
event_page.Term_Conditions__description1: This promotion accumulated realbet only available for any Sports or Esports during FIFA WORLD CUP period.
event_page.Term_Conditions__description2: This weekly accumulated realbet is counted from Monday 00.00am to Sunday 11.59pm.
event_page.Term_Conditions__description3: Once member achive the realbet required , member can contact our Livechat to redeem the bonus.
event_page.Term_Conditions__description4: Member require x3 turnover before withdraw this bonus.
event_page.Term_Conditions__description5: Member are only able to claim bonus one times per week.
event_page.Term_Conditions__description6: This promotion cannot be used in conjunction with other OB promotions.
event_page.Term_Conditions__description7: OB reserves the right to modify, cancel, suspend or terminate the promotion and/or change the terms of the said promotion at any time without prior notice.
event_page.Term_Conditions__description8: Participating members must accept and comply with all the terms mentioned above as well as all relevant rules and regulations stated on the OB website.
event_page.PREDICTION__Term_Conditions__item__conte: During FIFA WORLD CUP period , deposit and prediction win more rewards!
event_page.PREDICTION__Term_Conditions__description: Member are only able to choose one event type daily.
This event count deposit amount start from daily 00.00am -11.59pm

Once member achive the require deposit amount , member can contact our Livechat to get the prediction form and fill in to participate. Once win the prediction, wininng member can contact our Livechat to redeem your prizes.
Member require x3 turnover before withdraw this bonus.
This promotion cannot be used in conjunction with other OB promotions.
OB reserves the right to modify, cancel, suspend or terminate the promotion and/or change the terms of the said promotion at any time without prior notice.
Participating members must accept and comply with all the terms mentioned above as well as all relevant rules and regulations stated on the OB website.
event_page.how_to_play_step1__description: LOGIN or REGISTER an account at OB to participate
event_page.how_to_play_step2__description: Daily single deposit SGD 100 to earn 1 ticket during the event period
event_page.how_to_play_step3__description: Catch the Angpow to earn cash!
